Plot: 10-year-old fiona is sent to live with her grandparents in a small fishing village in donegal, ireland. she soon learns the local legend that an ancestor of hers married a selkie - a seal who can turn into a human. years earlier, her baby brother washed out to sea in a cradle shaped like a boat; someone in the family believes the boy is being raised by the seals. then fiona catches sight of a naked little boy on the abandoned isle of roan inish and takes an active role in uncovering the secret of roan inish. written by john oswalt.
Title: the secret of roan inish
